text:
[Verse]
Woke up to the sunshine
Peeking through my window
Birds are singing sweet tunes
Feels like a perfect show

[Verse 2]
Throw on my favorite jeans
Ready to embrace the day
City streets are calling me
In a most delightful way

[Chorus]
Sunshine bliss it's everywhere
Feel it in the open air
Spread your wings let's fly away
In the light we'll dance and play

[Verse 3]
Skipping stones by the river
Laughter echoes all around
Friends are there to catch you
Every time you fall to the ground

[Chorus]
Sunshine bliss it's everywhere
Feel it in the open air
Spread your wings let's fly away
In the light we'll dance and play

[Bridge]
Every moment shines so bright
In this golden morning light
Life's a song we sing out loud
In the sun we stand so proud
title: Sunshine Bliss
